item.description: James Cameron recently confirmed that the events of Avatar: Fire and Ash may not be what audiences want or expect, hinting at 1 tragic theory.

item.title: Cameron Diaz's 5 Action Movies, Ranked
item.description: Back in Action sees Cameron Diaz return to movies after over a decade. Here's where it ranks among the best action movies in her career.

item.title: Wicked Proves That The Wizard Of Oz's Yellow Brick Road Should Have Been A Different Color
item.description: In 2024’s Wicked, a brief scene between the Wizard, Glinda, and Elphaba proves that the iconic Yellow Brick Road should’ve been a different color.
